name: FireStarter (itch) (Shodanel, IvanFribourg)
description:
Fire Starter is a Forest simulation toy where you control Rain, Wind, and Fire to reshape the landscape and watch it change over time and seasons.

Play with the elements of nature to change its appearance.

For a better experience and visual quality, it is recommended to play the downloadable version.

Please consider commenting and rating this game to help us give you an even better experience in future updates.

This is our submission to Game Dev Network  - Game Jam 2021 with the following theme: Rebirth.
